ElseIf.expression: #program; if(User::getVariable('BankedJusticeAgents') > 0) { return true; } else { var character = Character::find('JusticeAgent'); var characterInstanceList = Land::getAllInstancesOfObject(character); foreach(characterInstanceList as instance) { if(!Object::getDelete(instance)) { return true; } } } return false;

If.expression: #program; if(User::getVariable('BankedJusticeAgents') > 0) { return false; } else { var character = Character::find('JusticeAgent'); var characterInstanceList = Land::getAllInstancesOfObject(character); foreach(characterInstanceList as instance) { if(!Object::getDelete(instance)) { return false; } } } return true;

#program; if(User::getVariable('BankedJusticeAgents') > 0) { return true; } else { var character = Character::find('JusticeAgent'); var characterInstanceList = Land::getAllInstancesOfObject(character); foreach(characterInstanceList as instance) { if(!Object::getDelete(instance)) { return true; } } } return false;

#program; if(User::getVariable('BankedJusticeAgents') > 0) { return false; } else { var character = Character::find('JusticeAgent'); var characterInstanceList = Land::getAllInstancesOfObject(character); foreach(characterInstanceList as instance) { if(!Object::getDelete(instance)) { return false; } } } return true;
